subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A crew member for Scott Riggs was suspended indefinitely by Nascar on Tuesday for shoving Kevin Harvick on pit road at Texas Motor Speedway on Sunday.
snippet: A crew member for Scott Riggs was suspended indefinitely by Nascar on Tuesday for shoving Kevin Harvick on pit road at Texas Motor Speedway on Sunday.
